import React, { SetStateAction } from 'react'; import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; import useAuth from '../hooks/useAuth'; interface SignIpModalProps { setModalState: React.Dispatch>; } export default function Signup({ setModalState }: SignIpModalProps) { const {login} = useAuth() return (

Entering: "ease-out duration-300" From: "opacity-0 translate-y-4 sm:translate-y-0 sm:scale-95" To: "opacity-100 translate-y-0 sm:scale-100" Leaving: "ease-in duration-200" From: "opacity-100 translate-y-0 sm:scale-100" To: "opacity-0 translate-y-4 sm:translate-y-0 sm:scale-95" */}

Signin

You need an account in order to create your own request.

{ login(values.email, values.password) .then(() => {setModalState(false)}) .catch((error) => { // setAlertOpen(true); // setAlertText(error.message); }) }} validationSchema={Yup.object({ email: Yup.string() .email('Invalid email address') .required('Required'), password: Yup.string() .min(5, 'Must be at least 5 characters long') .required('Required'), })} >
